1370: Bernero moved to Helle voet.D.3 after marriage.
Got married to Wijfgode at age 20 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Truden, at age 20.
1371: Had a son with Wijfgode, Vastraid, at age 21.
1372: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Flore, at age 22.
1373: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Lutghardis, at age 23.
1375: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Riet, at age 25.
1377: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Lisebette, at age 27.
1378: Lost daughter Riet when Riet was 4 years old.
1380: Lost daughter Lisebette when Lisebette was 4 years old.
1382: Had a son with Wijfgode, Blomart, at age 32.
1384: Had a son with Wijfgode, Suam, at age 34.
1388: Lost daughter Truden when Truden was 19 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Lost son Blomart when Blomart was 7 years old.
